Intervention: - Breast images with FFDM and DBT FFDM Plus DBT: FujiFilm Aspire Crystal System.
The success criteria require adequate performance in non-cancer cases (recall rate) and cancer cases (detection rate).
- Breast images with FFDM alone FFDM: FujiFilm Aspire Crystal System.
The success criteria require adequate performance in non-cancer cases (recall rate) and cancer cases (detection rate).
Eligibility: Women participating in FMSU004A protocol with known clinical status
Subjects with unknown clinical status not participating in FMSU004A.
Results: Assessment of the adequacy of training - cancer detection threshold and recall rate

The number of readers meeting the success criteria for the set of final cases of assessment of DBT and FFDM, which requires adequate performance in cancer cases (detection rate) as well as in non-cancer cases (recall rate).
Title of the arm/group: FFDM Plus DBT
Description of the arm/group: Breast images with FFDM and DBT FFDM Plus DBT: FujiFilm Aspire Crystal System.
The success criteria require adequate performance in non-cancer cases (recall rate) and cancer cases (detection rate).
Description of the arm/group: Breast images with FFDM alone FFDM: FujiFilm Aspire Crystal System.
